'''Anson Roper''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Anson was the son of [[Andwise Roper]], and cousin of [[Samwise Gamgee]]. He lived in [[Tighfield]] and probably followed his father's trade of ropery.<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>

==Etymology==
The name likely means "Andy's son".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.) ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
